oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Emmylou Harris Live at the Calderone Theatre - 1979-05-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Emmylou Harris' (musician) live performance at the Calderone Theatre. Harris was accompanied by the Whites (musical group). The performance was on May 25, 1979. The tape was created by the WHN radio network.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Emmylou Harris; The Whites
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) To Daddy (Emmylou Harris) -- (02:37) Easy From Now On (Emmylou Harris) -- (05:50) Emmylou Harris thanks various members of the Whites -- (06:29) Hello Stranger (Emmylou Harris) -- (10:20) Sister's Coming Home/Down at the Corner Beer Joint (Emmylou Harris) -- (13:54) Blue Kentucky Girl (Emmylou Harris) -- (17:31) Together Again (Emmylou Harris) -- (22:15) If I Could Only Win Your Love (Emmylou Harris) -- (25:13) Two More Bottles of Wine (Emmylou Harris) -- (28:40) Luxury Liner (Emmylou Harris) -- (34:22) Save the Last Dance for Me (Emmylou Harris) -- (38:13) Harris brings the Whites back on the stage -- (39:09) Another Lonesome Morning (Emmylou Harris) -- (42:47) Even the Cowgirls Get the Blues (Emmylou Harris) -- (47:06) Sin City (Emmylou Harris) -- (51:36) Tulsa Queen -- (56:55) Bottle Let Me Down (Emmylou Harris) -- (1:00:30) Ooh Las Vegas (Emmylou Harris) -- (1:05:18) Here, There and Everywhere (Emmylou Harris) -- (1:09:03) Leaving Louisiana in the Broad Daylight (Emmylou Harris) -- (1:13:10) C'est La Vie (You Never Can Tell) (Emmylou Harris) -- (1:17:20) Harris says goodbye to the audience
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Harris, Emmylou; the Whites (Musical group);
